verses.verse: <S%G3972>Paul<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4610>Silvanus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timotheus<s%>, unto the <S%G1577>church<s%> of the <S%G2331>Thessalonians<s%> which is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>: <S%G5485>Grace<s%> be unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G3421>Remembering<s%> without <S%G89>ceasing<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2873>labour<s%> of <S%G26>love<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> of <S%G1680>hope<s%> in <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, in the <S%G1715>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%>;
<S%G1492>Knowing<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G25>beloved<s%>, <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1589>election<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>. beloved: or, beloved of God, your election

<S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1411>power<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G4136>assurance<s%>; <S%G2531>as<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> what manner of <S%G3634>men<s%> we <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G5209>your<s%> sake.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G3402>followers<s%> of <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>, having <S%G1209>received<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%>, <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> sounded <S%G1837>out<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G882>Achaia<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God-ward<s%> is spread <S%G1831>abroad<s%>; <S%G5620>so<s%> that <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2192><s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G518>they<s%> <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G518>shew<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> what <S%G3697>manner<s%> of entering <S%G1529>in<s%> we <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> ye <S%G1994>turned<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1497>idols<s%> to <S%G1398>serve<s%> the <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> to wait <S%G362>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%>, even <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G4506>delivered<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%>.
